roles: cost analyst
managing director of P&G U.K.
president of global fabric care
group president for Europe
supporting_quotes: Polman worked for Procter & Gamble for 27 years, starting in 1979 as a cost analyst,
becoming managing director of P&G U.K. from 1995 to 1998,
president of global fabric care from 1998 to 2001,
and group president for Europe in 2001.

roles: chief financial officer
vice president and head of the Americas
supporting_quotes: Polman then joined Nestlé in 2006 as chief financial officer
and in February 2008 became vice president and head of the Americas.

roles: chief executive officer
board member
supporting_quotes: was the CEO of Unilever from 2009 to 2019, he set an ambitious vision to fully decouple business growth from its overall environmental footprint and increase the company’s positive social impact through the Unilever Sustainable Living Plan.
On 1 January 2009, Polman succeeded Patrick Cescau as chief executive officer of Unilever.
In November 2018, Polman announced he was stepping down as chief executive officer of Unilever at the end of 2018 with Alan Jope succeeding him.
Polman served on the board of Unilever from 2009 to 2019

roles: Chevalier de la Légion d'honneur
supporting_quotes: Chevalier de la Légion d'honneur (2016)

roles: co-founder
board member and major shareholder
supporting_quotes: In 2019 Polman, alongside Jeff Seabright, former Chief Sustainability Officer (C.S.O.) of Unilever, co-founded a new venture named Imagine to help businesses 'eradicate poverty and inequality, and stem runaway climate change'.
Imagine Consultancy was purchased by Systemiq, an environmental consultancy firm focused on essential system change, of which Polman is a board member and major shareholder, in 2022.
Imagine World was acquired by Systemiq in 2022 of which Polman remains a board member as well as major shareholder.

roles: Founders Board member of TPG Rise
supporting_quotes: Polman sits on the Founders Board of TPG Rise, a $7 billion social-impact fund, alongside Bono and Jeffrey Skoll.

roles: founding Co-Chair of EQT Future
supporting_quotes: Polman is also founding Co-Chair of EQT Future, a €3 billion long-hold impact fund, alongside Jacob Wallenberg.

roles: honorary doctorate
supporting_quotes: In June 2014 Polman received his honorary doctorate during the 400th anniversary of the University of Groningen.

roles: honorary doctorate
supporting_quotes: In May 2018, Polman received an honorary doctorate from George Mason University.

events.canonical_org_name: World Business Council for Sustainable Development
roles: chair of the World Business Council for Sustainable Development
supporting_quotes: Polman is a former chair of the World Business Council for Sustainable Development and sat on the board of directors of the Consumer Goods Forum,

events.canonical_org_name: Consumer Goods Forum (The Consumer Goods Forum)
roles: board member of the Consumer Goods Forum
supporting_quotes: Polman is a former chair of the World Business Council for Sustainable Development and sat on the board of directors of the Consumer Goods Forum,

events.canonical_org_name: UN Global Compact (United Nations Global Compact)
roles: member of the board of the UN Global Compact
supporting_quotes: He is also a member of board of the UN Global Compact.

events.canonical_org_name: UN High Level Panel of Eminent Persons on the Post-2015 Development Agenda
roles: member of the UN High Level Panel of Eminent Persons on the Post-2015 Development Agenda
supporting_quotes: At the invitation of the UN Secretary General Ban Ki-moon, Polman served as one of the 27 members of the UN High Level Panel of Eminent Persons on the Post-2015 Development Agenda.

events.canonical_org_name: Global Commission on the Economy and Climate (New Climate Economy)
roles: member of the International Council of the Global Commission on the Economy and Climate
co-chair of the Global Commission for the Economy and Climate
supporting_quotes: Polman served on the International Council of the Global Commission on the Economy and Climate
Polman is co-chair of the Global Commission for the Economy and Climate

roles: co-author of a report published by the International Food Policy Research Institute (IFPRI)
supporting_quotes: He has co-authored a report published by the International Food Policy Research Institute (IFPRI)

roles: co-founder of the Dutch Sustainable Growth Coalition
supporting_quotes: Polman co-founded the Dutch Sustainable Growth Coalition, led by former Dutch prime minister Jan Peter Balkenende

events.canonical_org_name: World Economic Forum (The World Economic Forum)
roles: member of the World Economic Forum International Business Council
co-chair of the World Economic Forum 2012
supporting_quotes: He is a member of the World Economic Forum International Business Council
He was co-chair of the World Economic Forum 2012

events.canonical_org_name: Global Taskforce for Scaling up Nutrition (SUN)
roles: member of the Global Taskforce for Scaling up Nutrition (SUN)
supporting_quotes: the Global Taskforce for Scaling up Nutrition (SUN)

roles: part of the European Resource Efficiency Platform Working Group
supporting_quotes: and was part of the European Resource Efficiency Platform Working Group

roles: counsellor of One Young World
supporting_quotes: and counsellor of One Young World

roles: trustee of the Leverhulme Trust
supporting_quotes: and trustee of the Leverhulme Trust

roles: co-chair of the B-20 Food Security Taskforce
supporting_quotes: Polman was co-chair of the B-20 Food Security Taskforce

roles: member of IESE's International Advisory Board (IAB)
supporting_quotes: He has been a member of IESE's International Advisory Board (IAB) since 2015

roles: president of the Kilimanjaro Blind Trust
supporting_quotes: He is president of the Kilimanjaro Blind Trust, a foundation he created alongside fellow climber Erik Weihenmayer

roles: chair of the Perkins International Advisory Board
supporting_quotes: and chair of the Perkins International Advisory Board

roles: member and chair of The B Team
supporting_quotes: He is a member of The B Team, chairing the group from August 2018 to September 2021

roles: Chair of the Board for University of Oxford
supporting_quotes: In 2019 Polman was appointed as Chair of the Board for University of Oxford

roles: European Business Leader of the year
supporting_quotes: European Business Leader of the year by Wall Street Journal/CNBC (2003)

roles: CEO of the year
supporting_quotes: Investor Magazine CEO of the year (2010,2011,2012)

roles: Business Leader for the World
supporting_quotes: INSEAD Business Leader for the World Award (2012)

roles: Duke of Edinburgh Conservation Medal
supporting_quotes: WWF's Duke of Edinburgh Conservation Medal (2013)

roles: Lifetime Achievement Award
supporting_quotes: Rainforest Alliance Lifetime Achievement Award (2014)

roles: David Rockefeller Bridging Leadership award
supporting_quotes: David Rockefeller Bridging Leadership award - Synergos (2014)

roles: Doctor Honoris Causa
supporting_quotes: Doctor Honoris Causa of Business School Lausanne (2014)

roles: Doctorate of Laws
supporting_quotes: 14 honorary doctorates, including a Doctorate of Laws from the University of Bath.

roles: The International Executive of the Year
supporting_quotes: Academy of International Business (AIB) The International Executive of the Year Award (2023)
